#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
 
int main(void)
{
	int N, M, n;
 
	N = M;
 
	while (scanf("%d", &n) != EOF)
	{
		N=n%100;
		M=n/100;
 
		int temp1 = sqrt(N);
		temp1 = sqrt(temp1);
 
		int temp2 = sqrt(M);
		temp2 = sqrt(temp2);
 
		temp1 = temp1 * temp1;
		temp1 = temp1 * temp1;
 
		temp2 = temp2 * temp2;
		temp2 = temp2 * temp2;
 
		if (temp1 == N || temp2 == M)
		{
			printf("1\n");
		}
		else
		{
			printf("-1\n");
		}
	}
 
	return 0;
}
